description:
Dietfried Bougainvillea is a naval captain in the navy and http://anidb.net/ch90198 [Gilbert]`s older brother. He was the one who found http://anidb.net/ch89959 [Violet] and made her into Gilbert`s "weapon" on his promotion to a major in the army.
Source: Violet Evergarden Wiki
name: Dietfried Bougainvillea
